item.title: Trump touts policies aimed at promoting homeownership in Davos speech
item.description: President Trump said his plans for boosting home affordability are already helping, but stopped short of providing details.

item.title: Justice Dept. kills cases cracking down on auto emissions cheating
item.description: The Justice Department ordered prosecutors to drop all pending cases targeting the sale of illicit "defeat devices" in diesel-powered vehicles.

item.title: Wacky jobs: Doggy treat tasters
item.description: "Sunday Morning" takes a look at a few occupations where employees' jobs are far from ordinary. Susan Spencer gets a peak inside the taste test crew a...

item.title: Wealth inequality in America just hit its widest gap in three decades.
item.description: Nearly one-third of U.S. household wealth was held by the top 1% in the third quarter of 2025.

item.title: Concerns mount over Reza Valizadeh, Iranian-American journalist wrongfully detained in Iran
item.description: Reza Valizadeh, a 49-year-old dual U.S.-Iranian citizen and longtime critic of Iran, was arrested in September 2024 by the Islamic Revolutionary Guard...
